name: Boti: Byteland Overclocked - Prologue
description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2161050/Boti_Byteland_Overclocked/



Boti: Byteland Overclocked combines classic 3D platforming with a splash of innovation. Double jump, dash, hover, and glide through vibrant levels, discovering fantastic combos inspired by the very essence of computers and technology. Oh, and did we mention seamless co-op?



Enjoy the first steps in the tutorial as Boti, the endearing data bot. And when you are ready, go on with Zero and One, Boti’s cheerful companions, to explore the mysteries of Motherboard Island in the expanded first level of the game!



Share the pure enjoyment of sliding to the Byteland beats, pulling off some byte-tastic combos or exploring the vibrant, colorful cyber-world with your friends or family through our drop-in, drop-out co-operative mode!
